Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A 10 - year - old male with acute leukemia presented with post - chemotherapy anemia .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| acute leukemia |
| post-chemotherapy anemia |

The two disease entities identified in the paragraph are "acute leukemia" and "post-chemotherapy anemia".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| acute leukemia |

The only clear disease entity in the paragraph is "acute leukemia". The phrase "post-chemotherapy anemia" is not a disease itself, but rather a condition resulting from chemotherapy treatment. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for a disease entity.
